caption: Instance Profile
description: Information about the instance profile associated with the compute resource, which provides the resource with permissions to interact with other services
name: instance_profile

created_time.description: The time when the instance profile was created.

name.description: The name of the instance profile.

path.description: The path of the instance profile.

uid.description: The unique ID of the instance profile.

uid_alt.description: This is the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.

users.description: The users of the instance profile.
